name: London Sports
description:
The Summer London Games are just around the corner and friendly competition is in the air! People all around the world have gathered to see which nation has the best athletes around the globe. Training has begun. You have been chosen to represent your country in track and field, but do you have what it takes to get the gold?!

Begin to practice on the 100-meter dash and collect sponsor coins along the way! Invest them in agility, strength, and endurance at the gym for a competitive edge. Unlock new sporting games as you progress and prove that you have what it takes to be the best!

Compete with your friends and family on Facebook to see who has the best times, longest throws, and highest jumps! Post your scores and represent your home country with your superior athleticism and sportsmanship. When medals are given to the strongest competitors, will you be on the stage or in the crowd? The choice is yours!"
